text: Akshara Haasan (born 12 October 1991) is an Indian actress who has appeared in Tamil and Hindi-language films. She is the daughter of actors Kamal Haasan and Sarika Thakur, and the younger sister of Shruti Haasan == References == == Other websites == * Category:1991 births Category:Actors from Chennai Category:Living people
title: Akshara Haasan
